title: Stock Alert
welcomeText: Hello, this is your Stock Alert service
companyIndexTitle: Select your company index you would like to follow
amountTitle: Set the minimum price limit. Under this price the alarm will be triggered
previewTitle: Pick your company index and see preview
summary: Data presented on the widget will be downloaded every 1 minute after the first configuration. The exact time of data collection will be shown at the bottom of the list.
apiKeyTitle: Please fill your unique API key
apiKeyLink: Click here to get your free API key
subscribeFirst: You have to subscribe to the service to see actual data
